explains: n. 伊玛目；（伊斯兰的）阿訇

sentences.en: The tip's resident Imam lives with his 11 children in a house made of materials scavenged from rubbish.
sentences.cn: 垃圾场的定居者 Imam 和他的十一个孩子住在一个由垃圾中捡来的材料建造的房子里。

sentences.en: Amrozi Nurhasyim, Ali Gufron, and Imam Samudra, have been sentenced to death for the 2002 Bali bombings that claimed the lives of 202 people.
sentences.cn: 阿姆鲁兹·努尔哈希姆、阿里·古弗隆和伊玛目·萨穆德拉因2002年巴厘岛爆炸事件而被判死刑，爆炸造成202人死亡。

sentences.en: But the New York cleric, Imam Feisal Abdul Rauf, has denied any such meeting.
sentences.cn: 但纽约伊玛目拉乌夫否认有任何会面计划。
